item.content:encoded:

From the brand

Shop Petkin Sunscreen Products

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 7 x 4.8 inches; 4.08 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Petkin
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08LMMSQ83
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.





Read more



Original Wipes Germ Wipes Oatmeal Wipes Paw Wipes Plaque Wipes Plaque Gel
Why Use? Wipes that help freshen up your pet every day. Easily remove daily dirt and odor with a quick wipe down Heavy duty pet wipes that remove daily dirt and odor, like washing hands. Cleans your pet without shampoo Gentle pet wipes enriched with oatmeal. Easily remove daily dirt, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin The quick and convenient way to remove dirt, sand and mud from your pet’s paws after outdoor fun Dental wipes that remove daily residue to keep your pet’s teeth and gums clean and healthy Easy to use dental gel that cleans teeth, gums, plaque and tartar while freshening your pet’s breath
For Dogs & Cats ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
No Parabens or Sulfates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Veterinarian Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

item.content:encoded:
Price: $1,500.00
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:19:11 UTC – Details)


Amazon.com Gift Cards are the perfect way to give them exactly what they’re hoping for – even if you don’t know what it is. Amazon.com Gift Cards are redeemable for millions of items across Amazon.com. Item delivered is a single physical Amazon.com Gift Card. Gift card is attached to a folded blank greeting card and is packed in an individual 5.25 x 7.25 inch envelope. Envelope is delivered sealed. An additional 5 x 7 inch unsealed envelope is also provided.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8 x 5.5 x 0.1 inches; 0.8 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 12, 2015
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Amazon
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B009WD3X2S
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More

Gift Card has no fees and no expiration date
No returns and no refunds on Gift Cards
Gift Card is redeemable towards millions of items storewide at Amazon.com
Scan and redeem any Gift Card with a mobile or tablet device via the Amazon App
Free One-Day Shipping (where available)
Customized gift message, if chosen at check-out, only appears on packing slip and not on the actual gift card or carrier

Previous page

  1. Send by Mail Gift Cards

    Gift cards in a gift box, reveal, or greeting card

    Free two or one-day shipping (where available)

  2. Digital Gift Cards

    Deliver now or schedule in advance

    Add a personal message

    Send via email or text

  3. Animated Gift Cards

    Add a personal message

    Send now or later via email or text

  4. Print at Home Gift Cards

    Easy to print and give

    Print out PDF file from Your Orders

    Perfect to give in person

  5. Add Your Photo or Video

    Add a personal message

    Send by email or text

Next page

1 Send by Mail 2 Digital 3 Animated 4 Print at Home 5 Add Your Photo or Video

How do I add a gift message? Will my gift message print on the card?

Add a gift card to your cart. At check out, check “Add Gift Options” and “This is a gift.” The gift message will be printed on a separate physical packing slip and not on the gift card product.

Will the gift amount be printed on the gift card?

Not necessarily, only certain gift cards have the gift amount printed on the gift card.
